channel.title: CVE Feed for LifePoint Informatics -- Patient Portal

item.title: CVE-2022-1067|2024-09-17T02:06:17.670Z -- lifepoint%20informatics -- patient%20portal
item.description: Navigating to a specific URL with a patient ID number will result in the server generating a PDF of a lab report without authentication and rate limiting.
